movie.title: House on Haunted Hill
movie.description_intro: An eccentric millionaire and his wife host a party in a haunted mansion for five strangers, who'll each be given $10,000 if they survive the night. A promotional stunt was created for its release in theatres, for which a plastic skeleton was flown over the audience during key moments of the film.
movie.description_full: An eccentric millionaire and his wife host a party in a haunted mansion for five strangers, who'll each be given $10,000 if they survive the night. A promotional stunt was created for its release in theatres, for which a plastic skeleton was flown over the audience during key moments of the film.

movies.title: August Rush
movies.summary: Twelve years ago, on a moonlit rooftop above Washington Square, Lyla Novacek (Keri Russell), a sheltered young cellist, and Louis Connelly (Jonathan Rhys Meyers), a charismatic Irish singer-songwriter, were drawn together by a street musician's rendition of ''Moondance'' and fell in love. After the most romantic night of her life, Lyla promised to meet Louis again but, despite her protests, her father rushed her to her next concert--leaving Louis to believe that she didn't care. Disheartened, he found it impossible to continue playing and eventually abandoned his music while Lyla, her own hopes for love lost, was led to believe months later that she had also lost their unborn child in a car accident. Their orphaned son (Freddie Highmore) uses his musical talent as a clue to find his birth parents.

Disheartened, he found it impossible to continue playing and eventually abandoned his music while Lyla, her own hopes for love lost, was led to believe months later that she had also lost their unborn child in a car accident. Their orphaned son (Freddie Highmore) uses his musical talent as a clue to find his birth parents.

Their orphaned son (Freddie Highmore) uses his musical talent as a clue to find his birth parents.

movies.title: Daybreak
movies.summary: Drama based on Alan Bowne's play Beirut, takes place in the decrepit New York City of the near future, controlled by a fascistic government.
movies.description_full: Drama based on Alan Bowne's play Beirut, takes place in the decrepit New York City of the near future, controlled by a fascistic government.
movies.synopsis: Drama based on Alan Bowne's play Beirut, takes place in the decrepit New York City of the near future, controlled by a fascistic government.

movies.title: The Magic School Bus Rides Again: The Frizz Connection
movies.title_english: The Magic School Bus Rides Again: The Frizz Connection
movies.title_long: The Magic School Bus Rides Again: The Frizz Connection (2020)
movies.summary: A lightning separates the Magic School Bus into three pieces, scattering the class across the globe with different versions of Ms. Frizzle aboard each bus.
movies.description_full: A lightning separates the Magic School Bus into three pieces, scattering the class across the globe with different versions of Ms. Frizzle aboard each bus.
movies.synopsis: A lightning separates the Magic School Bus into three pieces, scattering the class across the globe with different versions of Ms. Frizzle aboard each bus.

movies.title: Venom
movies.summary: After their car breaks down in an isolated desert, a mother and young daughter are relentlessly pursued by a deadly snake.
movies.description_full: After their car breaks down in an isolated desert, a mother and young daughter are relentlessly pursued by a deadly snake.
